findings.title: Owner Privileges
findings.description: The contract contains ownership functionality and ownership is not renounced which allows the creator or current owner to modify contract behaviour.

findings.title: Outdated Compiler Version
findings.description: Using an outdated compiler version can be problematic especially if there are publicly disclosed bugs and issues that affect the current compiler version.

findings.title: Use of floating pragma
findings.description: Solidity source files indicate the versions of the compiler they can be compiled with using a pragma directive at the top of the solidity file. This can either be a floating pragma or a specific compiler version.
